name: K.O.M.A
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 8, 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 10, 64-bit Processor: Core i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 Storage: 3 GB available space
